entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of snow squalls early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
